CustomField.inlineHelpText: When a VIN is entered in this field, this manual for this SO will be hidden from the Pubs schedule and backlog because it is being combined with another SO. NOTE: applies only to this manual type within this SO. If only other manuals for an SO will be combined, the other "XX Manual Identical To" fields will be used. If all manuals for this SO will be combined with another SO, this field will be blank and "Manuals Identical To" above will be used instead.
CustomField.label: Parts Manual ID To
